feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-06-15T16:00:09.135200Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;Zluda：在英特尔 GPU 上运行 CUDA 代码，未修改</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/vosen/ZLUDA</id>; <updated>;2023-06- 15T14:59:14.444346Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/vosen/ZLUDA"/>; <author>; <name>;goranmoomin</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=goranmoomin</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/vosen/ZLUDA/master/GeekBench_5_2_3.svg" 样式="宽度：220px；高度：98px；" />;<br />;ZLUDA 是英特尔 GPU 上 CUDA 的直接替代品，允许未经修改的 CUDA 应用程序以接近本机的性能在英特尔 GPU 上运行。它适用于当前集成的英特尔 UHD GPU，并将适用于未来的英特尔 Xe GPU。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#zluda-run-cuda-code-on-intel-gpus-unmodified" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36341211" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我们的 Python 3.13 计划</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/faster-cpython/ideas/blob/main/3.13/README .md</id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T12:59:14.445245Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/faster-cpython/ideas/blob/main/3.13/README. md"/>; <author>; <name>;bratao</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=bratao</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;< img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/f42f9fc5e6fe849d4e4d0075d31339dbd5222ff14bae399a53b0095ca74fad1c/faster-cpython/ideas" style="宽度：220px；高度：110px；" />;<br />;本文讨论了已为 Python 3.13 完成的基础工作，特别侧重于创建低开销可维护的机器代码生成器。 Python 3.13 的目标是将花在解释器上的时间减少至少 50%，并提高子解释器的并行性。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#our-plan-for-python-3-13" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36339777" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Unihiker，一款售价 80 美元的单板 PC，配备 2.8 英寸触摸屏、四核 ARM Cortex-A35</stitle>; <id>;https://www.unihiker.com/ </id>; <updated>;2023-06-15T14:59:14.447044Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.unihiker.com/"/>; <author>; <name>;nathanasmith</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=nathanasmith</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://dfimg.dfrobot.com/5b162d5ce6313c632b15d738 /cmsen/ce57942960eccfad7829780e0f75d22d.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：321px；" />;<br />;UNIHIKER 是一款带有 2.8 英寸触摸屏、Wi-Fi 和蓝牙的单板计算机 (SBC)。它支持各种传感器和执行器，可以通过计算机、iPad 或手机进行编程。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#unihiker-an-80-single-board-pc-with-2-8-touchscreen-quad-core-arm-cortex-a35" target="_blank ">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36341287" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry >; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;考古学家发现一把 3000 年前的剑，保存完好</stitle>; <id>; https://newsingermany.com/archaeologists-find-3000-year-old-sword/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T14:59:14.447607Z</更新>; <link href="https:// newsingermany.com/archaeologists-find-3000-year-old-sword/"/>; <作者>; <name>;janpot</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=janpot</ uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://newsingermany.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/02/image-2022-02-07T170112.334-1.png " style="宽度：220px；高度：122px；" />;<br />;这个时代的剑剑据说很少见，要么来自 19 世纪故意打开的墓葬，要么是个别的，推测是牺牲品。现在发现的这把剑来自一座坟墓，里面有丰富的青铜器具。里面埋葬着一个男人、一个女人和一个青年。目前还不清楚这些人之间可能有什么关系。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#archaeologists-find-3000-year-old-sword-exceptionally-well-preserved" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36340671" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Effective Rust</stitle>; <id>;https://www.lurklurk.org/effective-rust/</id>; <更新>;2023 -06-15T10:59:14.448136Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.lurklurk.org/effective-rust/"/>; <author>; <name>;FL33TW00D</name>; <uri>;https ://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=FL33TW00D</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;3.13。第 13 条：使用默认实现来最小化所需的特征方法 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#effective-rust" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https ://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36338529" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Reddit 的停电抗议将无限期持续</stitle>; <id>;https://old.reddit.com/r/technology/comments/149zmar/reddits_blackout_protest_is_set_to_continue /</id>; <updated>;2023-06-15T15:31:14.448532Z</updated>; <link href="https://old.reddit.com/r/technology/comments/149zmar/reddits_blackout_protest_is_set_to_continue/"/>; <author>; <name>;rajeevk</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rajeevk</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src=" https://external-preview.redd.it/8s1A-vMzazbyFKe5ManrJM64rpxaBioCu1ilo4keF5w.jpg?width=1200&height=628.272251309&auto=webp&crop=1200:628.272251309,smart&v=enabled&s=0385b2ad3 bbea431eaecaeb597c89743433af133" style="width: 220px; height: 116px;" />;<br />;Reddit 过去鼓励使用第三方应用程序访问他们的平台，但现在他们想迫使用户关闭广告拦截器以提高盈利能力。<a href="https://hackernews .betacat.io/#reddits-blackout-protest-is-set-to-continue-indefinitely" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=36341941" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;Hacker News 需要暗模式</stitle>; <id>;https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36342085</id>; <updated>;2023-06-15T15:41: 14.448941Z</updated>; <link href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36342085"/>; <author>; <name>;jaylittle</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=jaylittle</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Hacker News 应该为用户提供暗模式选项，因为黑客更喜欢暗模式。它甚至可以自动选择暗模式基于他们的浏览器偏好。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#hacker-news-needs-a-dark-mode" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36342085" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;矩阵食谱 [pdf]</stitle>; <id>;https://www.math.uwaterloo.ca/~hwolkowi/matrixcookbook.pdf </id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T14:59:14.449327Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.math.uwaterloo.ca/~hwolkowi/matrixcookbook.pdf"/>; <作者>; <name>;sebg</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=sebg</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;这些页面是有关事实的集合矩阵和与它们有关的事项。以这种形式收集它是为了方便任何需要快速桌面参考的人。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-matrix-cookbook-pdf" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator。 com/item?id=36340930" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;W3C 宣布新的在线支付 Web 标准</stitle>; <id>;https://www.applemust.com/w3c-announces-new-web-standard-for-online-payments/ </id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T15:19:14.449746Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.applemust.com/w3c-announces-new-web-standard-for-online- payments/"/>; <author>; <name>;serhack_</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=serhack_</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <img src="https://www.applemust.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/spc-tx.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：206px；" />;<br />;万维网联盟宣布了一项针对新浏览器功能的新网络标准，该标准有助于简化用户身份验证并增强网络结账期间的支付安全性。安全支付确认 (SPC) 使商家、银行、支付服务提供商、卡网络和其他方能够降低强客户身份验证 (SCA) 的摩擦，并生成用户同意的加密证据，这两个监管要求的重要方面，例如支付欧洲的服务指令 (PSD2)。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#w3c-announces-new-web-standard-for-online-payments" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36341750" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Show HN: Agency – 在 Python 中统一人类、AI 和其他计算系统</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/operand /agency</id>; <updated>;2023-06-15T13:59:14.450125Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/operand/agency"/>; <author>; <name>;0perand< /name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=0perand</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://camo.githubusercontent. com/e456241994556f8813ee73b4ae269ce1772fbf70f09db2861c97a0b5c691f0f6/68747470733a2f2f692e6962622e636f2f6e62764c4a76672f536372656 56e73686f742d323032332d30362d31342d61742d332d35392d30312d414d2e706e67" style="宽度：220px；高度：301px；" />;<br />;用于统一人类、AI 和其他计算系统的快速和最小的基础，在 python 代理中定义了一个通用的通信和操作框架，用于集成 AI 代理、人类和传统计算系统。 agency 允许您建立称为“空间”的共享环境，在该环境中，任意数量的人类、人工或其他计算系统都可以作为您可以对其执行“操作”的单独“代理”来平等地相互称呼。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-agency-unifying-human-ai-and-other-computing-systems-in-python" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36326587" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Quake 的闪电枪错误解释</stitle>; <id>;https://www.youtube.com/watch?v =4gNYTqn3qRc</id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T04:59:14.450512Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4gNYTqn3qRc"/>; <作者>; < name>;henning</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=henning</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<iframe src="//www. youtube.com/embed/4gNYTqn3qRc" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen loading="lazy">;</iframe>; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#quake-s-lightning-gun-bug-解释" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36315529" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;< /content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;FANN：200 行 Rust 中的向量搜索</stitle>; <id>;https://fennel.ai/blog/vector-search-in-200-lines-of-rust/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T10:59:14.450877Z</更新>; <链接href="https://fennel.ai/blog/vector-search-in-200-lines-of-rust/"/>; <author>; <name>;ingve</name>; <uri>;https://news. ycombinator.com/user?id=ingve</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://fennel.ai/blog/content/images/2023/06/data- src-image-050a1e4d-0798-44ef-b0e4-22974a071d5f.png" style="width: 220px; height: 181px;" />;<br />;由于 AI/ML 采用的进步，矢量数据库变得越来越普遍。本文解释了矢量数据库的工作原理，并演示了如何使用 Rust 代码构建一个简单的矢量搜索库。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#fann-vector-search-in-200-lines-of-rust" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36338365" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;在 40 小时内抓取 25 亿个网页（2012 年）</stitle>; <id>;https://michaelnielsen.org/ddi/how-to-crawl-a -quarter-billion-webpages-in-40-hours/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-15T07:59:14.451227Z</updated>; <link href="https://michaelnielsen.org/ddi/how -to-crawl-a-quarter-billion-webpages-in-40-hours/"/>; <author>; <name>;swyx</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id= swyx</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://michaelnielsen.org/ddi/wp-content/uploads/2012/08/quarter_billion_page_crawl_big_picture.png" style="宽度: 220px; height: 133px;" />;<br />;作者使用 20 个 Amazon EC2 机器实例在不到 40 小时的时间内抓取了超过 2.5 亿个网页。他们想了解抓取一小部分 Web 所需的资源并描述他们的详细信息这篇文章中的项目。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#crawling-a-quarter-billion-webpages-in-40-hours-2012" target="_blank">;[summary]</ a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36337473" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base= "https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;水泥的未来可能是碳捕集和电气化的结合</stitle>; <id>;https://industrydecarbonization.com/新闻/cements-future-could-be-a-combination-of-carbon-capture-and-electrification.html</id>; <updated>;2023-06-15T12:59:14.453008Z</updated>; <link href= “https://industrydecarbonization.com/news/cements-future-could-be-a-combination-of-carbon-capture-and-electrification.html”/>; <author>; <name>;hannob</name>; <uri >;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=hannob</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://industrydecarbonization.com/i/cementplant-624 .jpg" style="宽度: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;这篇文章讨论了水泥行业脱碳所面临的挑战，该行业是大量二氧化碳排放的罪魁祸首。它探讨了碳捕获和电气化作为减少水泥生产排放的解决方案的潜力. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#cement-s-future-could-be-a-combination-of-carbon-capture-and-electrification" target="_blank">;[总结] </a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36339253" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <条目 xml： base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;摩托车的保养知识</stitle>; <id>;https://books.worksinprogress.co/book/维护一切/车辆/what-motorcycles-teach-about-maintenance/4</id>; <updated>;2023-06-15T13:59:14.453751Z</updated>; <link href="https://books .worksinprogress.co/book/maintenance-of-everything/vehicles/what-motorcycles-teach-about-maintenance/4"/>; <author>; <name>;ericwaller</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=ericwaller</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://res.cloudinary.com/books-in-progress/image/upload/c_lfill ,f_auto/v1/bip/ru6muku66bmhkbpo5uet" style="宽度: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;《车间课堂作为灵魂工艺》和《禅与摩托车维修的艺术》将摩托车维修作为探索工作价值和现实结构的一种方式。两位作者都强调修复中发现问题和解决问题的重要性，以及对经验和判断的需求。修复可能是一种破坏性干预，维护管理不善会导致灾难性后果。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat. io/#what-motorcycles-teach-about-maintenance" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36340482" target=" _blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;谷歌警告拥有员工关于将数据输入聊天机器人并使用来自聊天机器人的代码</stitle>; <id>;https://www.reuters.com/technology/google-one-ais-biggest-backers-warns-own-staff-about-chatbots -2023-06-15/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T14:59:14.454114Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.reuters.com/technology/google-one-ais -biggest-backers-warns-own-staff-about-chatbots-2023-06-15/"/>; <author>; <name>;kjhughes</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user? id=kjhughes</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cloudfront-us-east-2.images.arcpublishing.com/reuters/2RTX7DJ5QZPFDKFIB7KGAYJOI4.jpg" 风格= “宽度：220px； height: 147px;" />;<br />;Alphabet Inc 警告员工如何使用聊天机器人，包括其自己的 Bard，同时在全球推广该程序。谷歌母公司建议员工不要进入其将机密材料放入 AI 聊天机器人中，引用长期存在的信息保护政策。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#google-warns-own-staff-about-entering-data-into-using-code -from-chatbots" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36341188" target="_blank">;[评论]</ a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;像变形金刚一样思考 (2021) [pdf]< /stitle>; <id>;https://arxiv.org/abs/2106.06981</id>; <updated>;2023-06-15T08:59:14.454471Z</updated>; <link href="https://arxiv.org /abs/2106.06981"/>; <author>; <name>;jbay808</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jbay808</uri>; </author>; <content type="html ">;<img src="https://static.arxiv.org/static/browse/0.3.4/images/arxiv-logo-fb.png" style="width: 220px; height: 129px;" />;<br />;文章提出了一种用于转换编码器的计算模型，称为受限访问序列处理语言 (RASP)，它将转换编码器的基本组件映射为简单的原语。它演示了如何使用 RASP 为 Transformer 学习的任务编写解决方案，以及如何训练 Transformer 以模仿 RASP 解决方案。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#thinking-like- transformers-2021-pdf" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36311871" target="_blank">;[评论]< /a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;ESP32-C3 无线探险：综合指南到物联网 [pdf]</stitle>; <id>;https://www.espressif.com/sites/default/files/documentation/ESP32-C3%20Wireless%20Adventure.pdf</id>; <更新>;2023-06- 15T03:59:14.454824Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.espressif.com/sites/default/files/documentation/ESP32-C3%20Wireless%20Adventure.pdf"/>; <作者>; <名称>;sohkamyung</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=sohkamyung</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;文章是乐鑫的一本书的总结关于 ESP32-C3 微控制器 SoC 的系统，这是一种用于连接设备的经济高效的解决方案。本书涵盖与物联网开发相关的各种主题，包括物联网项目开发、硬件设计、无线通信和量产优化。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#esp32-c3-wireless-adventure-a-comprehensive-guide-to-iot-pdf" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36336112" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Stack Overflow 关闭</stitle>; <id>;https://www.stackstatus.net/</id>; <updated>;2023 -06-15T14:59:14.455177Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.stackstatus.net/"/>; <author>; <name>;qsantos</name>; <uri>;https://news .ycombinator.com/user?id=qsantos</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;状态页面 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#stack-overflow-is- down" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36340755" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;< /content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;6502 代码的行为驱动开发</stitle>; <id>; https://github.com/martinpiper/BDD6502</id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T10:59:14.455540Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/martinpiper/BDD6502"/ >; <author>; <name>;ingve</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ingve</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src= “https://opengraph.githubassets.com/3a71e0d9bddd7abc999022f4375ee8d00a66397c74992291523da7284f507237/martinpiper/BDD6502” style="width: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;本文讨论了一个允许行为驱动开发 (BDD) 测试与 6502 代码一起使用的项目。该框架支持使用人类可读的自动化测试来测试 6502 代码，有助于减少调试时间并提高代码效率。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#behaviour-driven-development-with-6502-code" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36318281" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;本周 Rust 499</stitle>; <id>;https://this-week-in-rust.org/blog/2023/06 /14/this-week-in-rust-499/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T07:59:14.455889Z</更新>; <link href="https://this-week-in-rust .org/blog/2023/06/14/this-week-in-rust-499/"/>; <author>; <name>;unripe_syntax</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user? id=unripe_syntax</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Rust 本周是对 Rust 编程语言的进展和社区的每周总结。它包括构建管道、回归、改进、RFC 和即将到来的 Rust 事件的更新。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#this-week-in-rust-499" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36337500" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;协助运营 Megaupload 的男子在新西兰被判入狱</stitle>; <id>;https://abcnews.go.com/Technology/wireStory/2-men-helped-run -popular-pirating-website-megaupload-100099005</id>; <updated>;2023-06-15T11:59:14.456237Z</updated>; <link href="https://abcnews.go.com/Technology/wireStory/ 2-men-helped-run-popular-pirating-website-megaupload-100099005"/>; <author>; <name>;jacquesm</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jacquesm< /uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://s.abcnews.com/images/International/wiredory_a858f2a77b4eebf912711e818d6400f5_12x5_992.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：92px；" />;<br />;两名协助运营盗版网站 Megaupload 的男子被新西兰法院判处两年多监禁。这些人承认自己是犯罪集团的一员，并通过欺骗使艺术家蒙受损失。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#men-who-helped-run-megaupload-sentenced-to-prison-in-new-zealand" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36338979" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;构建一个自己开源的平台</stitle>; <id>;https://zed.dev/blog/open-sourcing -zed-on-zed</id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T08:59:14.456971Z</更新>; <link href="https://zed.dev/blog/open-sourcing-zed-on- zed"/>; <author>; <name>;signa11</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=signa11</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;< img src="https://zed.dev/img/post/open-sourcing-zed-on-zed/open-sourcing-zed-on-zed.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：98px；" />;<br />;本文讨论了关于代码的高效对话的重要性，以及开放公共编码通道以扩展此功能的计划。目标是让人们在编写代码时可以收听、观看和与团队聊天，并最终将平台开源。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#building-a-platform-that-open-sources-itself" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36337828" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;自动平分 Linux 内核以查找错误（2020）</stitle>; <id>;https://paulgraydon.co.uk/posts/2020-12- 27-automated-kernel-bisection/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T10:59:14.457339Z</更新>; <link href="https://paulgraydon.co.uk/posts/2020-12- 27-automated-kernel-bisection/"/>; <author>; <name>;luu</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=luu</uri>; </author>; <内容type="html">;这篇文章讨论了作者自动平分 Linux 内核以追踪特定性能回归的方法。他们解释了如何使用 git 和 qemu 来缩小与回归相关的提交集并找到问题的具体根源。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#automatically-bisecting-the-linux-kernel-to-find-a-bug-2020" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36319380" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;愚蠢的程序员宣言</stitle>; <id>;https://hasen.substack.com/p/the-stupid-programmer-宣言</id>; <updated>;2023-06-15T11:59:14.457695Z</updated>; <link href="https://hasen.substack.com/p/the-stupid-programmer-manifesto"/>; <作者>; <name>;hsn915</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=hsn915</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https ://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2Ff60e024a-be4a -494b-a4ba-58fb6094784d_1472x816.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：122px；" />;<br />;这篇文章是关于一个程序员，他承认自己在编程方面很糟糕，并且在各个领域都缺乏智慧。他们使用简单而低效的方法来完成工作。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-stupid-programmer-manifesto" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator。 com/item?id=36338873" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;减少摩擦</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.ceejbot.com/posts/reduce-friction/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-15T07:59:14.458039 Z</updated>; <link href="https://blog.ceejbot.com/posts/reduce-friction/"/>; <author>; <name>;luu</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=luu</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://blog.ceejbot.com/images/honeycomb-build-trace.png" 样式="宽度：220px；高度：119px；" />;<br />;本文讨论了在工程组织中减少摩擦的重要性，以及领导者可能对在该领域投入资源的阻力。它强调了减少摩擦的好处，并就如何有效地做到这一点提供了建议。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#reduce-friction" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=36306337" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
